Who is Stephen Koontz?

Creative Director

Stephen is the founder and senior officer of AED Publishing. He is also a writer, game designer, and engineer. He is the author of the 5th Conspiracy RPG, has won many awards including multiple Ennies over his career, and was the Lead Engineer and Director of Engineer for the Roll20 virtual tabletop. Stephen is neurodivergent and has suffers from myalgic encephalomyelitis since childhood. He has spent the majority of his life in California and Arizona, having attended UCSD where he got his degree in writing. Stephen currently resides in Phoenix Arizona with his wife and two kids.
